metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6395 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in header.php in Ganglia Web 3.5.8 and 3.5.10 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the host_regex parameter to the default URI, which is processed by get_context.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganglia-webfrontend - 3.6.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganglia-web package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.1-1').
